title: Favourite skin
body:
Hello

I'm interested to hear what your favourite skin is and why?

Mine is DJ Sona or Challenger Ahri.
DJ Sona: because of the level of detail that went into making that skin, I mean, different music and particles for each of the 3 songs and just how well it fits her as a champion. The colours are really pretty as well tbh.

Challenger Ahri: I love the colours of this skin for Ahri, it's not too promiscuous but it fits with her theme well. I love what it stood for as well  the start of a season and she was the sort of mascot for the challenge ahead.

Your turn!
